creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Rug,large, with white field covered with elaborate angular floral and vine design in pale blue, brown and pink. The corners of the field are pale henna color. Three borders, one wide with tortoise pattern and two narrow with undulating vine and rosette design. Sides overcast with blue, brown and beige wool. Ends have a short fringe. Ghiordes knot.
title: Rug
